attributes.action: regulate the management of residential leasehold properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Switching residential Leasehold to Commonhold would be perfect, more feasible is the regulation of management.

Although not simply a standards issue, many agents are members of ALMA, ARMA & more.  Sadly, there's no guarantee it'll be permanent & as a moot point, would you sell up if your current agent lost their membership & begun dirty tactics?

Obviously it's not the same as getting works done based on a company's registration with a legit standards association, & these are peoples sanctuaries we're talking about!  Besides, furore over the lack of 1st time buyer homes & manic house building proves the property market was wanting.

Many agencies outside these associations are guilty of the aforementioned ploys, & thousands of UK residents are affected.

Regulation should allow responsible Leaseholders to live peaceably, with less fear of threats & exploitation (least of all via sly charges).

Unite to raise the minimum standard & filter out this hassle to our already stressful lives!
